policies.cancellation: Appointments can be cancelled up to 24 hours in advance without penalty. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a 50% fee.
policies.rescheduling: Appointments can be rescheduled up to 2 hours before the scheduled time.
policies.payment: Payment is due at the time of booking. We accept all major credit cards and digital payments.
policies.preparation: Please arrive 10 minutes early for your appointment. Bring any relevant documents or materials discussed during booking.
policies.privacy: All client information is kept strictly confidential and secure.

commonQuestions.question: What are your business hours?
commonQuestions.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 5 PM, Saturday from 10 AM to 2 PM, and closed on Sundays.

commonQuestions.question: How can I schedule an appointment?
commonQuestions.answer: You can schedule an appointment by calling us, using our online booking system, or speaking with me right now. I can check availability and book your appointment immediately.

commonQuestions.question: What services do you offer?
commonQuestions.answer: We offer business consultation, general appointments, team meetings, and technical support. Each service has different durations and pricing.

commonQuestions.question: What's your cancellation policy?
commonQuestions.answer: You can cancel appointments up to 24 hours in advance without penalty. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a 50% fee.

commonQuestions.question: Do you offer virtual meetings?
commonQuestions.answer: Yes, we offer both in-person and virtual meetings depending on your preference and the type of service.

commonQuestions.question: How much do your services cost?
commonQuestions.answer: Pricing varies by service: Business consultation is $150/hour, general appointments are $75/30min, team meetings are $100/45min, and technical support is $50/30min.
